01112024: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
02112024: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
03112024: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
04112024: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
05112024: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
06112024: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
07112024: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
08112024: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
09112024: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
10112024: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
11112024: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
12112024: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.
13112024: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
14112024: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
15112024: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
16112024: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
17112024: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
18112024: Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally. It comes from what you do consistently.
19112024: Dream big and dare to fail.
20112024: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
21112024: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
22112024: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
23112024: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
24112024: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
25112024: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
26112024: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
27112024: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
28112024: It’s not about having time. It’s about making time.
29112024: Go the extra mile. It’s never crowded there.
30112024: Stay positive, work hard, make it happen.
